Params: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg
The chime of notification suddenly rings inside Strike Hawk's lounge.
>>>>Mission notification delivered.
>>>>Construct: Wanshi. Mission selected.
As it rings, the dimly lit sleeping pod slowly opens up and awakes from sleep mode.
Inside sleeps one of the three members of Strike Hawk.
Wanshi
Can't I catch a break for once... What's wrong this time...
Constructs technically do not require sleep, but waking up to a mission notification is still very irritating.
Wanshi
...Oh, this thing. We'll probably sort it out in a week.
Wanshi
But... what just... fell on my eye masks?
Taking off his mask, Wanshi finds two stickers attached to it, one for each eye. The stickers are red, with a golden "good fortune" written on them, and they look very festive.
Wanshi shakes his head helplessly.
Wanshi
...What a nuisance. Hey, Kamui.
Wanshi
They should be here at this hour. I should head out and take a look.
Wanshi gets up from his pod and discovers that something else is also attached to the two sides of it.
Wanshi
Aren't these couplets... Gotta hand it to him.
The notification ringtone is still going on in his comms, but Wanshi pays no attention. He grabs his gears and takes his time to head out.
Wanshi
Hey, Captain, did you know Kamui—
Rubbing his eyes, Wanshi notices both Chrome and Kamui are sleeping on the floor on top of the soft cushions.
Wanshi
...Fell asleep, huh?
In the main room of the lounge, a holographic display lies on the floor.
It is probably playing the performance review and related footage of Kamui on the battlefield.
Kamui
Zzz... Capt... let me do another one...
Seeing that the footage goes for at least a dozen hours, Wanshi cannot help but tremble.
He wonders if it was the boring lectures that bored Kamui to sleep, or if the obstinate Kamui had spent all of Chrome's energy.
Wanshi
...I guess I can skip the goodbyes. Great, if it means I can skip the scolding.
Wanshi turns to look at the couplets by his pod before looking at the sleeping Kamui, and his eyes narrow with an idea in mind.
Wanshi
Seeing that you pulled a prank on me—
Wanshi
It's only polite to return the favor.
And then the refreshed Strike Hawk member leaves the room with a yawn.
While the two sleeping members in the lounge are now covered with their own blankets.
Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg
Ayla
Chairman, all the couplets have been given out today, and everyone seemed to like them.
Allen
That's wonderful news. Thanks for your hard work today, Ayla.
Ayla
Hard work indeed. Especially when we had to deal with Nikola...
Allen
Sigh, we'll get used to it.
Ayla
By the way... Can I take another set of couplets back?
Allen
Sure. Do you still have somewhere to decorate?
Ayla nods with a slight hint of sadness, and Allen can guess where she is planning to put them from her face.
Allen
Of course... You can go.
Ayla
Thank you, Chairman... Then I'll...
Ayla does a small parting gesture and turns to leave.
Allen
—Instead of just a beautifully decorated room, I think what Selena would want to see more when she returns is a happy, energetic Ayla. So, please, take care of yourself.
Ayla does not reply. She takes a deep breath, and then she smiles.
Ayla
Of course! I'm not giving up on her! I'm going to find her in the coming year!
Allen
That's good to hear. Happy New Year, then, Ayla—and may your wish come true.
Ayla
Not just my wish—I hope that all of our wishes will come true this year!
